mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id,sk.user_phone,sk.state,sk.create_time, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.create_time as "seckill.create_time", s.start_time as "seckill.start_time", s.end_time as "seckill.end_time" from seckill_success sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
